title: Privacy Policy | Plataforma Astral
description: Plataforma Astral Privacy Policy in accordance with Law 19.628

section_1.title: 1. General Information
section_1.content_1: This Privacy Policy describes how Plataforma Astral SpA collects, uses, stores, and protects the personal information of users of our educational platform.
section_1.content_2: We are committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of our users, complying with applicable Chilean legislation, especially Law 19.628 on Personal Data Protection.

section_2.title: 2. Information We Collect
section_2.direct_info_1: Full name, RUN/RUT and date of birth

section_3.title: 3. Purposes of Processing
section_3.content_1: We use your personal information for the following purposes:
section_3.content_2: Manage access and use of the educational platform
section_3.content_3: Facilitate communication between the educational community
section_3.content_5: Comply with legal and regulatory obligations
section_3.content_7: Improve the quality of our educational services

section_4.title: 4. Information Sharing
section_4.content_1: We may share your information in the following situations:
section_4.content_2: With educational institutions for authorized academic purposes
section_4.content_3: With service providers who help us operate the platform
section_4.content_4: When required by law or competent authority
section_4.content_5: With your express consent for specific purposes

section_5.title: 5. Information Security
section_5.content_1: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your data:
section_5.content_2: Data encryption in transit and at rest
section_5.content_4: Continuous security monitoring and threat detection

section_6.title: 6. Data Subject Rights
section_6.content: In accordance with Law 19.628, you have the following rights:
section_6.right_1: Right of access to your personal data
section_6.right_2: Right of rectification of inaccurate information

section_7.title: 7. Cookies and Similar Technologies
section_7.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to improve your experience on our platform, remember your preferences, and analyze site usage. You can manage your cookie preferences through your browser settings.

section_8.title: 8. Minors
section_8.content: The platform is designed for educational use and may contain information about minors. Parents, guardians, or legal tutors are responsible for supervising the use that minors under their care make of our services.

section_9.title: 9. International Transfers
section_9.content: Your data is processed and stored primarily on servers located in Chile. In case of international transfers, we ensure adequate safeguards are implemented according to applicable legislation.

section_10.title: 10. Data Retention
section_10.content: We retain your personal information for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes described in this policy, unless the law requires a longer retention period.

section_11.title: 11. Contact
section_11.content: To exercise your rights or make inquiries related to the processing of your personal data, you can contact us through:

contact.address: Avenida Libertad #777, Viña del Mar, Valparaíso Region
